references.paper_title: NIA-AA Research Framework: Toward a biological definition of Alzheimer's disease
references.reason: This paper provides a critical framework for understanding Alzheimer's disease, shaping the direction of research and informing the development of diagnostic tools.

references.paper_title: Graph theory analysis reveals resting-state compensatory mechanisms in healthy aging and prodromal Alzheimer's disease
references.reason: This study uses graph theory to analyze brain networks, offering insights into the early stages of Alzheimer's disease and advancing the understanding of the disease's progression.

references.paper_title: Multimodal deep learning models for early detection of Alzheimer's disease stage
references.reason: This research utilizes multimodal deep learning techniques for early detection, demonstrating the potential of advanced AI in improving diagnostic accuracy.

references.paper_title: Blockchain technology in healthcare: A systematic review
references.reason: This review comprehensively examines the application of blockchain technology in healthcare, offering valuable context for the paper's use of blockchain for secure data management.
This foundational textbook provides the theoretical underpinnings of artificial intelligence, forming the basis for the paper's discussion of AI applications in Alzheimer's disease diagnosis.
